posts.post_content: Great abilitys. Combos well with bounce lands, those Worldwake land animation enchantments, and [Treasure Hunt](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Treasure Hunt). And landfall, of course. Play as part of a [Selective Memory](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Selective Memory)/[Treasure Hunt](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Treasure Hunt) combo deck, using [Tideforce Elemental](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Tideforce Elemental) to untap Budoka/Dokai.
posts.html:

Rating:

posts.post_content: Kamigawa was a very interesting set, but it really only works inside its own set. In any case, the problem I have with this card is 10 lands? Really? It sounds easy with the ability, but I've played sakura tribe scouts and while I get some fun out of land fall with them, you typically run out of all your extra land cards in one to three turns, and after that your auto playing them anyways. Can use it in a land fall type deck though to play lands during your opponents turn, which makes a difference with cards like steppe lynx and plated geopede.
posts.html:
Kamigawa was a very interesting set, but it really only works inside its own set. In any case, the problem I have with this card is 10 lands? Really? It sounds easy with the ability, but I've played sakura tribe scouts and while I get some fun out of land fall with them, you typically run out of all your extra land cards in one to three turns, and after that your auto playing them anyways. Can use it in a land fall type deck though to play lands during your opponents turn, which makes a difference with cards like steppe lynx and plated geopede.
